insert into tbl_menu (upper_menu_no, menu_name, main_flag, menu_code, menu_path, menu_required, menu_admin, menu_order, menu_default, uuid, filename, reg_user, reg_date) VALUE (#{upperMenuNo}, #{menuName}, #{mainFlag}, #{menuCode}, #{menuPath}, #{menuRequired}, #{menuAdmin}, #{menuOrder}, #{menuDefault}, #{uuid}, #{filename}, #{regUser}, #{regDate})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID()
mapper.select: SELECT um.* FROM tbl_menu m JOIN tbl_menu um on um.menu_no = m.upper_menu_no WHERE m.menu_code = #{menuCode}
SELECT * FROM tbl_menu WHERE upper_menu_no IS NULL

select distinct m.* from (WITH RECURSIVE etc AS (select tbl_orga.orga_no, tbl_orga.upper_orga_no, tbl_orga.orga_type from tbl_orga inner join tbl_emp_mapping eM on tbl_orga.orga_no = eM.orga_no inner join tbl_emp e on eM.emp_no = e.emp_no join tbl_dept_mapping d on tbl_orga.upper_orga_no = d.orga_no where username = #{username} # and d.dept_main = true UNION ALL select o.orga_no, o.upper_orga_no, o.orga_type from etc f inner join tbl_orga o on f.upper_orga_no = o.orga_no) select f.orga_no, f.orga_type from etc f) as f inner join tbl_orga_role o on o.orga_no = f.orga_no inner join tbl_role_group rg on o.role_group_no = rg.role_group_no join tbl_menu_role mr on rg.role_group_no = mr.role_group_no join tbl_menu m on mr.menu_no = m.menu_no order by f.orga_type

with recursive etc as (select menu_no , upper_menu_no , menu_name , uuid , filename , menu_code , menu_required , menu_admin , reg_user , reg_date , mod_user , mod_date , menu_order , menu_default , 0 depth , concat(menu_no) AS no_path , concat(menu_code) AS url from tbl_menu where menu_code = #{menuCode} union all select m.menu_no , m.upper_menu_no , m.menu_name , m.uuid , m.filename , m.menu_code , m.menu_required , m.menu_admin , m.reg_user , m.reg_date , m.mod_user , m.mod_date , m.menu_order , m.menu_default , depth + 1 , concat(no_path, '->', m.menu_no) AS no_path , concat(url, '/', m.menu_code) AS url from etc e join tbl_menu m on e.menu_no = m.upper_menu_no) select * from etc # FIXME : MENU_ORDER
